title: Workshop on LMS Design for Adaptive Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: A student-centered adaptive learning design course conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more adaptive learning rules applicable to LMS following DBR (Design-Based Research) methodology
Learners can create evaluation criteria that consider connectivity between learning activities based on peer feedback
Learners can prototype personalized learning pathways implementable in mobile environments on the Moodle platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
